casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

July 24, 2007

[Cite as 07/24/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-3722.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2006-1608. State v. Schlee.

Lake App. No. 2005-L-105, 2006-Ohio-3208. This cause is pending before the court on the certification of a conflict by the Court of Appeals for Lake County. Upon consideration of the joint motion of appellant and amicus curiae Ohio Public Defender for divided oral argument time,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
